DOC.brief_summary: - To assess safety tolerability repeat dose topical administration MRZ-99030 Ophthalmic Solution ascend dos healthy subject ( stage 1 ) glaucoma subject ( stage 2 ) . - To assess plasma pharmacokinetics urine concentration MRZ- 99030 metabolite MRZ-9499 single repeat dose topical administration MRZ-99030 Ophthalmic Solution .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability MRZ-99030 Eye Drops Healthy Volunteers Glaucoma Patients
DOC.criteria: For stage 1 : Healthy volunteer For stage 2 : Glaucoma patient For stage 2 : Any relevant eye disease glaucoma
